title: AMUMU LEARNS ULT AT LEVEL 5????
body: today i played a game as amumu jg. there was one weird thing. I was able to upgrade and use my ult at level 5.

replies.body: I'm pretty sure i used my ulti at level 5. I remember leveling it up and i was like why is my ult available.
Not sure how that could of happened, it may of just been a visual bug. Did you record using that ult at level 5?

I had a bug with Gnar where I went to throw boulder before Vi ulted me and I got ulted and even though the skill only came off cooldown (was mashing Q as it was coming off cd) as I was mid air it threw while i was in mid air and killed her then it went on a 3 second cd.
but did you? or was it a visual bug
